alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:02AM MDT until June 22 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Otero County in southeastern Colorado... Southwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... East central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 245 AM MDT. * At 201 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fowler, or 30 miles southeast of Pueblo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Fowler, Manzanola and Olney Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
